General.Name: Indonesian Tobacco Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Indonesian Tobacco Tbk manufactures and sells cigarettes and tobacco. The company processes tobacco leaves into finished products in the form of self-rolled tobacco or tobacco shags. It operates in Papua, Nusa Tenggara, Sulawesi, Kalimantan, Sumatera, Maluku, and Java; and Singapore, Malaysia, and Japan. The company was founded in 1955 and is headquartered in Malang, Indonesia.
General.Address: Jalan Letjen. S. Parman no. 92, Malang, Indonesia, 65122
